rComments: Although the course load was extremely heavy with a ton of reading this term, it was a pleasure to be in Dr. Laughlin's class while he taught at Brantford's Laurier campus. He's extremely laid back and respectful towards his students. He encourages class discussion without pressuring anyone to participate. Tough grader but fair!
teacherRatingTags: ["Skip class? You won't pass.", 'Get ready to read', 'Tough grader']

rComments: Tom is the best! He's amazing at clearly explaining extremely challenging readings and helping you see how they fit into a larger framework.  Fantastic class that gives you a massive toolbox of theories to use in every other class.  Can't recommend him enough

One of the best teachers I've had, university or otherwise. He obviously spends time on writing his lectures, and it shows. He can simplify even the toughest theorists and consistently checks in to make sure the class understands the material. Tough texts, but fair grader and fantastic teacher. Highly recommend.
Wonderful teacher! Very clear, helpful, and has a great sense of humour. Knew course material very well. I highly recommend taking his literary theory course.

so engaging, friendly, and approachable. knew his material extremely well, and never condescended at anyone. easy to reach via email. and he's hilarious in the most subtle ways. awesome prof - i'd recommend the course for its content anyways, but tom made the course just perfect.
